text: Gigi Hewitt (born July 6, 1972) is an equestrian who represents the United States Virgin Islands. She competed in the individual jumping event at the 2000 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:United States Virgin Islands female equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of the United States Virgin Islands Category:Equestrians at the 2000 Summer Olympics Category:Equestrians at the 1999 Pan American Games Category:People from Saint Thomas, U.S. Virgin Islands
title: Gigi Hewitt
